GSD.description:
tty: Fix a possible resource leak in icom_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit 8c014373f178a4f13a08e045ef63bdb23f62e892. For more details please see the references link.
